We load the worldbank data:

```{r}
dat <- read.csv("../data/extreme_poverty/share-of-population-in-extreme-poverty.csv")
```

And view their structure:

```{r}
View(dat)
```

We extract the data at the world level:

```{r}
world_dat <- dat[dat$Entity == "World" & dat$Year >= 2000, ]
names(world_dat) <- c("Entity", "Code", "Year", "Share")
```
